creator: Kwit SAS
descriptionHtml:
**TESTED AND APPROVED**

You just stopped smoking or you are about to say goodbye to cigarettes ... but you sometimes lack motivation? Kwit is the application you need to quit smoking and vaping !

💡A scientific method to support you in your smoking and vaping cessation

Inspired by Cognitive and Behavioral Therapy (or CBT), Kwit helps you fight the side effects of the smoking cessation through different strategies to confront the craving. You can finally say goodbye to cigarette and ecigarette!

📝 A personalized dashboard to quit smoking and vaping

Follow your progress on a daily basis and keep track of the evolution in your smoking cessation. The application will count the number of days without cigarettes, the number of cigarettes you didn’t smoke during that period or the money you saved. With Kwit, you will no longer be alone in your smoking and vaping cessation!

📖 A diary to keep tracks of your journey after stopping smoking and vaping

A craving? A relapse? Don’t worry, this is not the end of the world! Record the cigarettes you smoked to get a better understanding of your addiction and learn to overcome it. With Kwit, find the way to quit smoking and vaping that fits you best by following your daily cravings for cigarettes.

💊 An application designed to control your consumption of nicotine substitutes and ecigarette

You would like to stop vaping? Thanks to Kwit, understand your use of nicotine substitutes (gums, patches, vape or e-cigarettes) to lower your consumption little by little. Rediscover a cigarette-free and nicotine-free life!

✌️ Victories and achievements to keep you motivated

Observe day by day the advantages your smoking cessation has on your health. Start at level 1 and unlock new stages to gradually become the Ultimate Kwitter : tobacco-free, happier and healthier.

🎛 Precise tools to track your vaping habits

Your vape/ecigarette habits will no longer hold any secrets for you. You will have a precise view on the follow-up of your liquid or pod dosage.

✌️Relevant goals to motivate you

Look at the health benefits of quitting smoking over time. Start from level 1 and gradually work your way up to become the next Ultimate Kwitter: smoke-free, happier and healthier.

💪 Inspirational motivation cards

The craving is too strong? Shake your phone! Kwit is here to improve your motivation thanks to exclusive pieces of advice and messages of encouragement. An invaluable support in your smoking and vaping cessation!

With Kwit, you are 5 times more likely to successfully quit smoking, so don’t wait any longer and download the application right now!

Free to download and without ads, Kwit will support you regardless of your goals:
Quitting smoking
Reducing your consumption of nicotine substitutes
Stopping vaping
Monitoring your consumption of gums and/or patches
Understanding your cravings...

The free version gives you access to all the necessary features to quit smoking and leave cigarettes (and e-cigarettes) behind you for good. Yet, you can increase your chances to be successful in your smoking cessation by subscribing to Kwit Premium.

We always work to improve our application so that it meets the expectations of the Kwitters. You have a question or a suggestion to help make the smoking cessation process even more effective and adapted to your needs? Please contact us at : hello@kwitt.app.

💚 Say STOP to cigarettes and ecigarettes !

Quitting smoking is the best decision you can make in your life and for your health. Don’t forget: by saying goodbye to cigarettes, you increase your life expectancy and improve your health as well as the health of the people around you. It is never too late to stop smoking and vaping!

The smoking cessation is a challenge everybody can take up, and you can too! Now is the moment, so download Kwit (it’s free!) and start your tobacco-free life to be happier and healthier!

title: Kwit - Quit smoking for good!

creator: Kwit SAS
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to stop smoking or are considering it? Kwit multiplies by 5 your chances to succeed by offering you a way to quit smoking and taking control of your vaping! So hurry up, download for free our application and quit now!

💡A scientific method combined with a playful and caring approach

Inspired by Cognitive and Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Kwit helps you to achieve a smoke-free life. It offers you solutions to cope with cravings to smoke and vape. You can finally say goodbye to tobacco and vape!

📝 See your progress at a glance with our stop smoking counters

Track your progress day by day and see how far you've come thanks to the stop smoking counters. The application counts for you the days spent without cigarettes, the money saved, the cigarettes not smoked and many other things. You will never be alone again in your smoking cessation!

📖 Keep track of your journey with your diary

Log the cigarettes you smoke to get a better understanding of your dependence. Then learn how to overcome it. Find the strategies that work best to cope with your cravings and get help to quit smoking for good!

💊 Monitor your use of nicotine substitutes and vape

Would you like to stop using vape, electronic cigarettes or e-cig? The application helps you understand your use of nicotine substitutes (gums, patches, vape, electronic cigarette, e-cig) to gradually reduce your consumption. Rediscover a life free of cigarettes and nicotine!

✌️ Set goals and stay motivated

Experience the benefits of quitting smoking on your health as the days go by. Start at level 1 and gradually work your way up until you become the next Ultimate Kwitter: tobacco-free, happier, with more freedom, and healthier than ever!

💪 Inspirational motivational cards
Is the craving too intense? Shake your phone! Our app is here to boost your motivation with exclusive tips and encouraging messages. An invaluable support to quit smoking and achieve a smoke-free life!

Our stop smoking application is free to download and ad-free.It will support you regardless of your goals and needs:
• Getting help to quit smoking
• Reducing your consumption of nicotine substitutes
• Stopping vaping
• Keeping track of your consumption of gums and/or patches
• Overcoming your cravings
• Keeping track of your smoking cessation
• Understanding your cravings and emotions
• Finding new ways to quit smoking

If you are able to achieve a smoke-free life using only the free features, imagine how much easier it would be with the Premium version. Make sure to stack all the odds in your favor and quit smoking for good by subscribing to Kwit Premium now!

We always work to improve our application so that it meets the expectations of Kwitters. Do you have a question or a suggestion to make the smoking cessation process even more effective and adapted to your needs? Please contact us at: hello@kwit.app!

💚 Say NO to tobacco!

A smoke-free life is the best decision you can take for yourself and for your health. Remember, by quitting smoking, you will increase your life expectancy, improve your health and protect the ones you love. It is never too late to quit cigarettes or vape!

Everybody is able of quitting smoking and so are you, take on the challenge! Quit now, download for free our stop smoking application, and start your happier and healthier life without tobacco!

So, are you ready to quit now and join the great community of over 2.6 million Kwitters?

Using this application is anonymous, your data is secure. We only ask you to personalize your experience to offer you the best possible support .

title: Kwit - Quit smoking for good!

creator: Kwit SAS
descriptionHtml:
You just stopped smoking or you are about to say goodbye to cigarettes ... but you sometimes lack motivation? Kwit is the application you need to quit smoking and control your vaping !

💡A scientific method to support you in your smoking cessation

Inspired by Cognitive and Behavioral Therapy (or CBT), Kwit helps you fight the side effects of the smoking cessation through different strategies to confront the craving. You can finally say goodbye to cigarette and ecigarette!

📝 A personalized dashboard to quit smoking

Follow your progress on a daily basis and keep track of the evolution in your smoking cessation. The application will count the number of days without cigarettes, the number of cigarettes you didn’t smoke during that period or the money you saved. With Kwit, you will no longer be alone in your smoking and vaping cessation!

📖 A diary to keep tracks of your journey after stopping smoking and vaping

A craving? A relapse? Don’t worry, this is not the end of the world! Record the cigarettes you smoked to get a better understanding of your addiction and learn to overcome it. With Kwit, find the way to quit smoking and vaping that fits you best by following your daily cravings for cigarettes.

💊 An application designed to control your consumption of nicotine substitutes and ecigarette

You would like to stop vaping? Thanks to Kwit, understand your use of nicotine substitutes (gums, patches, vape or e-cigarettes) to lower your consumption little by little. Rediscover a cigarette-free and nicotine-free life!

✌️ Victories and achievements to keep you motivated

Observe day by day the advantages your smoking cessation has on your health. Start at level 1 and unlock new stages to gradually become the Ultimate Kwitter : tobacco-free, happier and healthier.

🎛 Precise tools to track your vaping habits

Your vape/ecigarette habits will no longer hold any secrets for you. You will have a precise view on the follow-up of your liquid or pod dosage.

✌️Relevant goals to motivate you

Look at the health benefits of quitting smoking over time. Start from level 1 and gradually work your way up to become the next Ultimate Kwitter: smoke-free, happier and healthier.

💪 Inspirational motivation cards

The craving is too strong? Shake your phone! Kwit is here to improve your motivation thanks to exclusive pieces of advice and messages of encouragement. An invaluable support in your smoking and vaping cessation!

With Kwit, you are 5 times more likely to successfully quit smoking, so don’t wait any longer and download the application right now!

Free to download and without ads, Kwit will support you regardless of your goals:
• Quitting smoking
• Reducing your consumption of nicotine substitutes
• Stopping vaping
• Monitoring your consumption of gums and/or patches
• Understanding your cravings...

The free version gives you access to all the necessary features to quit smoking and leave cigarettes (and e-cigarettes) behind you for good. Yet, you can increase your chances to be successful in your smoking cessation by subscribing to Kwit Premium.

We always work to improve our application so that it meets the expectations of the Kwitters. You have a question or a suggestion to help make the smoking cessation process even more effective and adapted to your needs? Please contact us at : hello@kwit.app.

💚 Say STOP to cigarettes!

Quitting smoking is the best decision you can make in your life and for your health. Don’t forget: by saying goodbye to cigarettes, you increase your life expectancy and improve your health as well as the health of the people around you. It is never too late to stop smoking and vaping!

The smoking cessation is a challenge everybody can take up, and you can too! Now is the moment, so download Kwit (it’s free!) and start your tobacco-free life to be happier and healthier!
descriptionShort: Kwit is the number 1 application to stop cigarettes and control your vaping 🚭

title: Kwit - Quit smoking for good!

creator: Kwit SAS
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to your new smoke-free life! Kwit is your pocket coach to help you quit smoking for good.
Kwit gives you quality content based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (or CBT), a scientifically approved method validated by our own experts within our scientific committee.
Don’t feel ready to quit smoking yet? Kwit helps you prepare for quitting smoking with a 9-step smoking cessation preparation program!

HOW DOES KWIT WORK?
TRACK YOUR SMOKING HABITS
- Quantify your progress and personalizing it into your own dashboard
- See the number of days you have gone without smoking
- Realize the number of cigarettes you didn’t smoke during your withdrawal
- Enjoy the money you have saved by not smoking

A DIARY TO KEEP TRACKS OF YOUR JOURNEY TO STOP SMOKING
- Keep a eye on your quitting smoking experience
- Tell Kwit when you have a craving and find the right solution to fight it
- Record the cigarettes you smoked to get a better understanding of your addiction
- Visualize all the efforts you made by stopping smoking
- Write down your feelings

VICTORIES AND ACHIEVEMENTS TO KEEP YOU MOTIVATED
- Earn experience points for quitting smoking
- Unlock health-related goals
- See the benefits of quitting smoking by playing

CONTROL YOUR CONSUMPTION OF NICOTINE SUBSTITUTES AND ECIGARETTES
- Fill in your nicotine substitutes
- Understand your use of gums, patches, vape or e-cigarettes
- Keep an eye on your nicotine consumption
- Use your substitutes to overcome your cravings

REGAIN CALM AND MOTIVATION
- Use breathing exercises to overcome your cravings and regain calm
- Shake your phone to boost your motivation to stop smoking
- Learn more about quitting smoking by reading articles written by our experts directly in Kwit

Kwit gives you quality content based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (or CBT), a scientifically approved method validated by our own experts within our scientific committee.
Don’t feel ready to quit smoking yet? Kwit helps you prepare for quitting smoking with a 9-step smoking cessation preparation program!

HOW DOES KWIT WORK?
TRACK YOUR SMOKING HABITS
- Quantify your progress and personalizing it into your own dashboard
- See the number of days you have gone without smoking
- Realize the number of cigarettes you didn’t smoke during your withdrawal
- Enjoy the money you have saved by not smoking

A DIARY TO KEEP TRACKS OF YOUR JOURNEY TO STOP SMOKING
- Keep a eye on your quitting smoking experience
- Tell Kwit when you have a craving and find the right solution to fight it
- Record the cigarettes you smoked to get a better understanding of your addiction
- Visualize all the efforts you made by stopping smoking
- Write down your feelings

VICTORIES AND ACHIEVEMENTS TO KEEP YOU MOTIVATED
- Earn experience points for quitting smoking
- Unlock health-related goals
- See the benefits of quitting smoking by playing

CONTROL YOUR CONSUMPTION OF NICOTINE SUBSTITUTES AND ECIGARETTES
- Fill in your nicotine substitutes
- Understand your use of gums, patches, vape or e-cigarettes
- Keep an eye on your nicotine consumption
- Use your substitutes to overcome your cravings

REGAIN CALM AND MOTIVATION
- Use breathing exercises to overcome your cravings and regain calm
- Shake your phone to boost your motivation to stop smoking
- Learn more about quitting smoking by reading articles written by our experts directly in Kwit

Top 7 reasons to download Kwit:
- Getting help to quit smoking
- Reducing your consumption of nicotine substitutes
- Stopping vaping
- Keeping track of your consumption of gums and/or patches
- Overcoming your cravings
- Keeping track of your smoking cessation
- Understanding your cravings and emotions
- Finding new ways to quit smoking


So, are you ready to quit now and join our strong and caring 3 million Kwitters community?

QUITTING SMOKING BECOMES POSSIBLE

Quitting smoking is the best decision you can make in your life and for your health. Don't forget: by saying stop to cigarettes, you increase your life expectancy and improve your health as well as the health of the people around you. It is never too late to quit smoking and stop vaping! Quitting smoking is a challenge everybody can take up, and you can too! Now is the moment, so download Kwit and start your smoke-free life to be happier and healthier!

Do you have a question or a suggestion to help make the smoking cessation process even more effective and adapted to your needs? Feel free to contact us at : hello@kwit.app

Using this application is anonymous, your data is secure. We only ask you to personalize your experience to offer you the best possible support .

Terms of Service & Privacy Policy : https://kwit.app/en/legal
descriptionShort: Start your smoke-free journey today!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi Kwitters ! This new version brings mostly bug fixes. Also, all users also get to access the first three goals of each category.
Happy Kwitting !

- Fill in your nicotine substitutes
- Understand your use of gums, patches, vape or e-cigarettes
- Keep an eye on your nicotine consumption
- Use your substitutes to overcome your cravings

REGAIN CALM AND MOTIVATION
- Use breathing exercises to overcome your cravings and regain calm
- Shake your phone to boost your motivation to stop smoking
- Learn more about quitting smoking by reading articles written by our experts directly in Kwit

Top 7 reasons to download Kwit:
- Getting help to quit smoking
- Reducing your consumption of nicotine substitutes
- Stopping vaping
- Keeping track of your consumption of gums and/or patches
- Overcoming your cravings
- Keeping track of your smoking cessation
- Understanding your cravings and emotions
- Finding new ways to quit smoking


So, are you ready to quit now and join our strong and caring 3 million Kwitters community?

QUITTING SMOKING BECOMES POSSIBLE

Quitting smoking is the best decision you can make in your life and for your health. Don't forget: by saying stop to cigarettes, you increase your life expectancy and improve your health as well as the health of the people around you. It is never too late to quit smoking and stop vaping! Quitting smoking is a challenge everybody can take up, and you can too! Now is the moment, so download Kwit and start your smoke-free life to be happier and healthier!

Do you have a question or a suggestion to help make the smoking cessation process even more effective and adapted to your needs? Feel free to contact us at : hello@kwit.app

Using this application is anonymous, your data is secure. We only ask you to personalize your experience to offer you the best possible support .

Terms of Service & Privacy Policy : https://kwit.app/en/legal

creator: Kwit SAS
descriptionHtml:
Transform your life by quitting smoking with Kwit, the WHO-approved app recommended by over 3 million Kwitters!

Say goodbye to tobacco addiction with Kwit, the app scientifically designed to help you quit smoking. Take advantage of the power of Behavioral and Cognitive Therapies (CBT) to say goodbye to cigarettes and e-cigarettes!

Track your progress and stay motivated with a personalized dashboard. Find out how many days you've gone without cigarettes, how much money you've saved, and how many cigarettes you haven't smoked. You won't be alone in your fight to stop smoking.

Record your journey and get extra support with the diary. Identify your cravings, record cigarettes smoked, and cope with relapses. Understand your addiction and learn how to overcome it to strengthen your commitment to quit smoking for good.

Control your use of nicotine substitutes and electronic cigarettes. Reduce your consumption gradually with personalized advice. Live life to the full without tobacco or nicotine!
Follow your vaping habits and control the dosage of your e-cigarette. Take control of your vaping and discover a life without electronic cigarettes.

Achieve your goals and stay motivated with our collection of inspiring motivational cards. Receive exclusive tips and messages of encouragement to help you stay motivated along the way.

Kwit is free and ad-free, offering comprehensive support for:
* Quitting smoking
* Reducing nicotine replacement therapy consumption
* Stop using electronic cigarettes
* Control vaping
* Monitoring gum and patch consumption
* Understanding cravings

For an even more rewarding experience, opt for Kwit Premium. You'll benefit from advanced features to help you quit smoking for good.
Quitting smoking is essential for your health and well-being and those around you.

Download Kwit now, the application recommended by millions of Kwitters, and join the community of people who have chosen to free themselves from tobacco. Your life without cigarettes starts today!

We're constantly improving the application to match your expectations as closely as possible. Do you have a question or a suggestion for improvement to make the smoking cessation experience even more effective and adapted? Don't hesitate to contact us at hello@kwit.app.

Quitting smoking is the best decision you can make in your life and for your health. Remember: by saying goodbye to tobacco, you increase your life expectancy and improve your health and those around you. It's never too late to quit smoking!

Quitting smoking is a challenge everyone can take up, and you can too! Download Kwit now and start your smoke-free life.

To find out more, read our terms of use and privacy policy at: https://info.kwit.app/en

Kwit is a support tool and does not replace treatment by a healthcare professional.
